text: Eusébio Oscar Scheid, S.C.J. (8 December 1932 – 13 January 2021) was a Brazilian prelate of the Catholic Church. He was Archbishop of Rio de Janeiro from 2001 to 2009. He was born in Luzerna, Brazil. Scheid was Bishop of São José dos Campos from 1981 to 1991 and Archbishop of Florianópolis from 1991 to 2001. Scheid died on 13 January 2021 in São José dos Campos, Brazil from pneumonia caused by COVID-19, aged 88. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2021 deaths Category:People from Santa Catarina Category:People from Rio de Janeiro Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Brazil Category:Brazilian cardinals Category:Brazilian Roman Catholic bishops Category:People from São José dos Campos
title: Eusébio Scheid
